title: Inkscapetober Day 21: Fuzzy
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]

[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
**Inkscapetober Day 21:** Fuzzy
**Author:** [[*user SleepOfReason]]
Check out more art [[[SleepOfReason creates art| here]]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]


[[=image Dora.png]]


**Subject:** Athenodora

**Commentary:** Athenodora, or Dora for short, is SkipIRC's favorite Australian cat. This is reflected in my choice for supporters. The coat of arms itself depicts a Mesopotamian winged human lion hybrid. This is in reference to Athenodora having a large interest in the Mesopotamian pantheon. Since all three creatures here depicted have fur, I decided to cover the background of the shields with ermine spots.

**How the prompt fits in:** Well, one could better ask how the prompt doesn't fit in. I mean, just about everyting is fuzzy. The cat is, the koala is, the Mesopotamian winged human lion hybrid is. Even the background is what's called a fur in heraldry.

@@ @@
